languages.text: "В любом случае сейчас это лишь руины былой славы. Мы наблюдаем следы многочисленных внутренних разгерметизаций, но ни одного следа агрессии, осуществлявшейся извне. Как бы то ни было, часть палуб выглядят целыми... снаружи".

"In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."
languages.original_text: "В любом случае сейчас это лишь руины былой славы. Мы наблюдаем следы многочисленных внутренних разгерметизаций, но ни одного следа агрессии, осуществлявшейся извне. Как бы то ни было, часть палуб выглядят целыми... снаружи".

traits.locale_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it is worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from here."

"In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it is worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from here."

"In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

"In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

"In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

languages.text: “无论怎样，这艘舰船已经失去了昔日的辉煌。我们观察到许多内部舱室减压的痕迹，但并没有探测到任何外部袭击的迹象。就观察结果而言，部分甲板看起来完好无损……至少从外面看起来是这样的。”
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

traits.locale_text: “无论怎样，这艘舰船已经失去了昔日的辉煌。我们观察到许多内部舱室减压的痕迹，但并没有探测到任何外部袭击的迹象。就观察结果而言，部分甲板看起来完好无损……至少从外面看起来是这样的。”

languages.text: « Dans tous les cas, cette Arche n'est plus que l'ombre d'elle-même. Nous observons de multiples traces de décompression interne, mais pas un seul signe d'agression extérieure. Toutefois, certains ponts semblent intacts... Du moins, vus d'ici. »
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

traits.locale_text: « Dans tous les cas, cette Arche n'est plus que l'ombre d'elle-même. Nous observons de multiples traces de décompression interne, mais pas un seul signe d'agression extérieure. Toutefois, certains ponts semblent intacts... Du moins, vus d'ici. »

languages.text: «De todas formas, ha perdido su antiguo esplendor. Hemos detectado algunos signos de descompresión interna, pero ni una sola marca de ataques al casco. Algunas cubiertas están intactas... Al menos su parte exterior».
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

traits.locale_text: «De todas formas, ha perdido su antiguo esplendor. Hemos detectado algunos signos de descompresión interna, pero ni una sola marca de ataques al casco. Algunas cubiertas están intactas... Al menos su parte exterior».

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、この船にかつての栄光は見る影もない。内部減圧の痕跡は多数見られるが、外部から攻撃された形跡はひとつもない。大したことではないが、デッキの一部は無傷だ…少なくとも外から見る分にはな」
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、この船にかつての栄光は見る影もない。内部減圧の痕跡は多数見られるが、外部から攻撃された形跡はひとつもない。大したことではないが、デッキの一部は無傷だ…少なくとも外から見る分にはな」

languages.text: "Aber klar ist, dass sie nur noch eine Ruine ist und ihren alten Glanz verloren hat. Wir stellen fest, dass an vielen Stellen im Inneren keine Dekompression mehr herrscht, aber wir finden keine Anzeichen äußerlicher Aggression. Manche Decks sehen sogar noch intakt aus ... Zumindest von außen."
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Aber klar ist, dass sie nur noch eine Ruine ist und ihren alten Glanz verloren hat. Wir stellen fest, dass an vielen Stellen im Inneren keine Dekompression mehr herrscht, aber wir finden keine Anzeichen äußerlicher Aggression. Manche Decks sehen sogar noch intakt aus ... Zumindest von außen."

languages.text: "Ama artık eski hâlinden eser yok. İç bölmelerdeki birkaç noktada basınç kaybı izlerine rastladık. Fakat dışarıdan müdahale edildiğine dair herhangi bir kanıt bulunmuyor. Önemi tartışılır ama bazı güverteler sağlam kalmış gibi... En azından dışarıdan öyle görünüyor."
languages.original_text: "In any case, she is a ruin of her former glory. We observe numerous traces of internal decompression, but not a single sign of aggression carried out from the outside. For what it's worth, some of the decks look intact... At least, from the outside."
